lead_paragraph: The governor has given a list of policy requests to lawmakers, who are considering holding a special legislative session this month to increase their salary.

headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Want Raise; Cuomo Adds to Wish List
headline.main: Cuomo Adds to His Wish List as State Legislators Seek a Raise

snippet: The governor has given a list of policy requests to lawmakers, who are considering holding a special legislative session this month to increase their salary....
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo responds to request by members of state's legislature seeking to convene special session in December to vote on pay raise by asserting they will also have to consider wider array of policy issues; move shocks Assembly Speaker Carl Heastie, who characterizes Cuomo's suggestion as 'inappropriate.'

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Independent Democratic Conference (New York State Senate)
